post.text: Join me LIVE in Cleveland, OH!

comment.author: Lia
comment.text: Meanwhile, Crooked Hillary Rotten Clinton speaks with 3 reporters on a plane while Tim Kaine helps prop her up to stand up. Lord, may their twisted, vile plans not prevail, in the name of Jesus!

replies.author: Kristopher
replies.text: Christians for trump, makes no sense , somebody's lieing.

replies.text: Yes Kristopher: Every time HER lips move she's LYING.
